marketplace_configuration.promo_code_message: Discounts cannot be applied to products from Marketplace Sellers. The discount has been applied to all applicable FedEx Office products in your cart.
marketplace_configuration.cart_quantity_tooltip: Quantities for Marketplace Seller cannot be edited in the cart. Click "Edit" to adjust the quantity for this Item.
marketplace_configuration.reorder_error_message: We are unable to combine this item with items in your cart or with other items selected for reorder.
marketplace_configuration.vendor_shipping_account_number_disclaime: This seller does not accept FedEx Shipping Accounts for shipping charges.
marketplace_configuration.review_and_submit_and_order_confirmation: Due to the customization of your order, no changes or cancellations are available after order submission.
